Content:
As AI continues to transform industries, the world of education is not immune to its disruptive potential. From personalized learning to concerns about academic integrity, educators, students, and institutions are grappling with how best to incorporate AI into the classroom. With both opportunities and challenges at play, itâ€™s crucial that we carefully consider the role of AI in shaping the future of education. 
In this article, I have shared my insights on how we can navigate these shifts. I hope it provides useful perspectives and sparks meaningful conversations around the responsible use of AI in education.
